nodes.text: Peko-Peko Munzati was an individual who lived during the time of the Galactic Empire. The bartender Midnight once mentioned Munzati in his journal, saying that the individual was once rumored to study purrgil on Bar'leth for months, although it could be just hiding from bounty hunters.
Peko-Peko Munzati is mentioned in the 2018 Studio Fun International replica journal Solo: A Star Wars Story: Tales from Vandor.
